text:
I observe stochastic crashes `[process exited with code 3221225727]` with Julia v1.6.0-beta1.0 on Win 10 when launched with `julia -t 4` .  `julia -t 1` seems stable, Julia v1.5.3 stable always.  Happens after many minutes rather than seconds, so repro is difficult, crashes in different locations.  Sometimes it prints
```Please submit a bug report with steps to reproduce this fault, and any error messages that follow (in their entirety). Thanks. Exception: EXCEPTION_ACCESS_VIOLATION at 0x7ffb6269cc83 -- RtlVirtualUnwind at C:\WINDOWS\SYSTEM32\ntdll.dll (unknown line) in expression starting at E:\foo.jl:125```
I have seen as well `[process exited with code 3221225477]`.
Good ideas how to debug?  Bisecting?

text: If you could write a script that can eventually reproduce the problem, I am sure the devs would appreciate an `rr` trace.
